CustomField.description: This formula field specify minimum agreement discount.
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( RecordType.DeveloperName == 'CLM_Discount' , RecordType.DeveloperName == 'CLM_Material_Group_1', RecordType.DeveloperName == 'CLM_Material_Number' ), Discount_Level_1__c , null)
CustomField.label: Agreement Minimum Discount
